name: Erganagh Goats Milk 1 Litre
description: Strathroy Goats Milk is sourced from local farms.

A special feeding system ensures the milk has an appetising and refreshing taste with a very mild flavour. Goat's milk is a healthy alternative to cow's milk and is believed to be beneficial in reducing the symptoms of some skin complaints and breathing disorders such as asthma.
Only milk from Certified Quality Assured farms is sold under this label.
PromotionDescription: Save 45p on any Alpro almond milk drink 1ltr
